title: Roseline492
author: Roseline492
content: The death of the late musicians mohbad has really open the eyes of every Nigerians to see true what is happening on the music industry today. His body has been assumed to carry out an OTOPSY in other to no what actually killed him. I came across this news this morning I decided to share below is the update about the OTOPSY:The Nigerian Police says an autopsy on the corpse of the late popular singer, Ilerioluwa Oladimeji Aloba, popularly known as Mohbad, has been completed.Police spokesman in Lagos State, SP Benjamin Hundeyin, on Thursday, revealed via a post on X, that the police are awaiting the result.Source: https://healthwise.punchng.com/late-mohbads-autopsy-completed-police-await-result/

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: There is an active thread already about Mohbad's death. You can post this instead on the existing discussion thread: Mohbad death!.It is advisable to lock this thread and further the discussion on the existing thread.To lock a thread, scroll down the thread, you will see lock topic beside move topic, click on lock topic.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Funny enough, this matter go still die off and naira Marley go still come back and everything will be swept under the rug and anytime Nigeria don dey play politics, you go see say everything go take very long to do and that's very bad and assuming say na poor man dey involved for this matter, them for don arrest am but since na naira, everybody mind don dey because nobody wan really be direct enemy. This fake love na something wey dey very adamant in our country and most times people dey only loyal for wetin Dem fit gain and I see no reason why police go first come announce say result don ready and also wait again to announce the result which absolutely wrong. This matter na emergency and right now I no really know wetin to believe because yesterday, person dey ask me if I sure say this mohbad really die?And his reason were really factual and I don already tire for the matter as I go like make them leave am make him go rest peacefully abeg.Edit: just as oga Charles don pint out, abeg I go advice make you lock the thread and make we go continue the talk for the other thread.
